src:
Rodrygo Bocah Ajaib Real Madrid, Bagaimana Reaksi Zinedine Zidane?
07 Nov 2019, 06:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Zinedine Zidane memilih bersikap tenang tentang performa luar biasa bintang muda Real Madrid, Rodrygo Goes, pada kemenangan 6-0 atas Galatasaray, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Zidane hanya tak ingin Rodrygo menghadapi tekanan berlebihan.
Bermain di Santiago Bernabeu, matchday 4 Grup A Liga Champions 2019/10, Los Blancos tampil luar biasa dalam kemenangan 6-0. Rodrygo menyumbangkan separuh dari enam gol tersebut, alias mencetak hattrick.
Bagi pemain 18 tahun, torehan Rodrygo jelas luar biasa, bocah ajaib. Dia pun mencetak rekor brace atau dua gol tercepat dalam sejarah Liga Champions, tepatnya hanya dalam 6 menit 14 detik setelah pertandingan dimulai.
Sebagai pelatih, Zidane tentu puas terhadap sumbangan Rodrygo, tapi dia mengaku tidak terkejut. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Rodrygo Magic Boy Real Madrid, How Does Zinedine Zidane React?
Nov 7 2019, 06:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Zinedine Zidane chose to be calm about the extraordinary performance of Real Madrid's young star, Rodrygo Goes, in the 6-0 victory over Galatasaray, Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. Zidane just didn't want Rodrygo to face excessive pressure.
Playing at the Santiago Bernabeu, Matchday 4 Group A Champions League 2019/10, Los Blancos performed exceptionally in a 6-0 victory. Rodrygo contributed half of the six goals, aka scoring a hat trick.
For 18-year-old players, Rodrygo's score is clearly extraordinary, a magical boy. He also set the brace record or the two fastest goals in Champions League history, precisely in only 6 minutes 14 seconds after the match began.
As a coach, Zidane was certainly satisfied with Rodrygo's donations, but he claimed not to be surprised. Read below, Bolaneters!
